contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 16, 2016 D Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest
Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest (Upper Sections) 10 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-brass-band-associat-3785
None
Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK Run as a single section for all bands. Open adjudication. 30 minute break for lunch after band drawn 7. Music adjudicator: Derek Broadbent; Entertainment adjudicator: Dave Lea
Best Entertainment: Rushden
Best Open section: Michelmersh Best 2nd section: Rushden Town Best 3rd section: Oxford Cherwell Best 4th section: Marsh Gibbon Best Unregistered: Yarnton
Best Open section soloist: Ben Abbott, euphonium, Kidlington Best 2nd section soloist: Micah Parsons, euphonium, City of Coventry Best 3rd section soloist: Steve Clapton, cornet, Oxford Cherwell Best 4th section soloist: Alan Jones, Wantage Academy Best Unregistered section soloist: Fiona Methley, flugel, Yarnton
Best Soprano: Connie Boler, Michelmersh Best Horn: Horn section, Kidlington (Marilyn Elliott, Claire Colebourn, Susan Peers) Best Percussion: Rushden Best Conductor: Adele Hudson, Rushden
Most under 19 players: Yarnton
President's Award: Dave Roberts
June 28, 2016, 9:01 a.m. Oct. 17, 2016, 11:59 a.m.
1 Michelmersh Silver Band Wayne Landen
2 Kidlington Concert Brass Duncan Wilson
2 Rushden Town Band Adele Hudson
4 Littleport Brass Nicholas Garman
5 Oxford Cherwell Brass Terry Brotherhood
6 City of Coventry Brass Band Stephen Cooper
7 Downton Band Paul Williams
